title: Enflamer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shroud the Underworld in flames at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All Underworld members become detection immune this night.
- While shrouded, all visitors to the Underworld become doused.
- You may shroud 3 times.
- If the Apocalypse is dead and there are no Underworld Offensive alive, you will become the Apocalypse.

desc:
Post 343
*You will not allow them to see. None deserve to watch the flames spread.*
Conversion Immune
